options.content:
This dashboard demonstrates Hedera Stats, a set of open-source methodologies providing Hedera network statistics. Easy access via Hgraph's APIs.

 More About Hgraph 👋
Hedera Stats Docs →
Hedera APIs →
For Enterprise →
Hgraph FAQs →
Feedback →

panels.description: Total revenue (earned via transaction fees) on Hedera for the last 1hr period (converted to USD).
panels.title: Revenue (USD) - 1hr

panels.description: The latest number of active developer accounts on Hedera (updated hourly).
panels.title: Active Dev Accounts - 1hr

panels.description: The latest number of active smart contracts on Hedera (updated hourly).
panels.title: Active Contracts - 1hr

panels.description: The most recent HBAR price for Hedera (updated hourly).
panels.title: HBAR Price - 1hr

panels.description: The most recent network Time to Consensus for Hedera (updated hourly).
panels.title: Time to Consensus

panels.description: Hourly active contracts, active developer accounts, network revenue and HBAR price. Using on-chain Hedera mirror node data from Hgraph's APIs and price feeds from DeFiLlama. This time series is an example of how to leverage Hedera Stats data to generate powerful visualizations and insights.
panels.title: Hourly Statistics (Network Health)

options.content:
# **⚙️ Network Stats**

Hedera's performance in the form of revenue, time to consensus and transactions per second.

panels.description: Total revenue generated via transaction fees in the last hour on Hedera (updated hourly).
panels.title: Revenue (HBAR) - 1hr

options.content: Hedera's network revenue is the total of all fees collected from every transaction on its network, with these fees shared among parts like the nodes, treasury, and reward accounts. By grouping these fees by service type, the network can easily see which areas are most active and generating revenue. View the docs and methodology.

panels.description: Total hourly network revenue generated via transaction fees on Hedera, plus revenue by service (HTS, HSCS, HCS).
panels.title: Hourly Network Revenue

panels.description: Total Hedera revenue over the last 24 hours.
panels.title: 24h Total (HBAR)

panels.description: Total Hedera revenue over the last 168 hours.
panels.title: 7d Total (HBAR)

panels.description: Total Hedera revenue over the last 2160 hours.
panels.title: 30d Total (HBAR)

panels.description: Total Hedera revenue over the last 2160 hours.
panels.title: 90d Total (HBAR)

panels.description: Total revenue from the most recent 24 hour period compared to the previous 720 hour period.
panels.title: 24h Change

panels.description: Total revenue from the most recent 168 hour period compared to the previous 168 hour period.
panels.title: 7d Change

panels.description: Total revenue from the most recent 720 hour period compared to the previous 720 hour period.
panels.title: 30d Change

panels.description: Total revenue from the most recent 2160 hour period compared to the previous 2160 hour period.
panels.title: 90d Change

panels.description: The most recent network TPS for Hedera (updated hourly).
panels.title: Latest TPS

options.content: Transactions Per Second (TPS) measures the number of transactions processed by the Hedera network within a given period. This metric provides insights into network activity, scalability, and overall transaction throughput. View the docs and methodology.

panels.description: Average TPS for the most recent 24 hour period compared to the previous 24 hour period.
panels.title: 24h Change

panels.description: Average TPS for the most recent 168 hour period compared to the previous 168 hour period.
panels.title: 7d Change

panels.description: Average TPS for the most recent 720 hour period compared to the previous 720 hour period.
panels.title: 30d Change

panels.description: Average TPS for the most recent 2160 hour period compared to the previous 2160 hour period.
panels.title: 90 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent network Time to Consensus for Hedera (updated hourly).
panels.title: Latest TTC

options.content: This statistic measures the delay between when a transaction is officially confirmed by the network and when its detailed record is created and made available. Essentially, it shows how quickly the network processes and documents transactions once they are approved. View the docs and methodology.

panels.description: Average TTC for the most recent 168 hour period compared to the previous 168 hour period.
panels.title: 24h Change

panels.description: Average TTC for the most recent 168 hour period compared to the previous 168 hour period.
panels.title: 7d Change

panels.description: Average TTC for the most recent 720 hour period compared to the previous 720 hour period.
panels.title: 30d Change

panels.description: Average TTC for the most recent 2160 hour period compared to the previous 2160 hour period.
panels.title: 90d Change

options.content:
# **👥 Activity Stats**

Network engagement generated by active accounts and contracts performing specific activity.

panels.description: Number of active Hedera accounts within the last hour.
panels.title: Active Last Hour

options.content: Active accounts are those that actively spend money to make transactions within a specific time period, rather than just receiving funds. This means the account owner is actively using the network by initiating actions like sending payments or interacting with services. View the docs and methodology.

panels.description: Total active accounts over the last 90 day period.
panels.title: 90 Day Total

panels.description: The most recent 7 day period compared to the previous 7 day period.
panels.title: 7 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 30 day period compared to the previous 30 day period.
panels.title: 30 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 90 day period compared to the previous 90 day period.
panels.title: 90 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 365 day period compared to the previous 365 day period.
panels.title: 1 Year Change

panels.description: Number of active Hedera developer accounts within the last hour.
panels.title: Active Last Hour

options.content: This statistic counts developer accounts that actively contribute to the network by launching or updating smart contracts, creating tokens, or making other meaningful changes beyond routine transfers. View the docs and methodology.

panels.description: Total active developer accounts over the last 90 days.
panels.title: 90 Day Total

panels.description: The most recent 7 day period compared to the previous 7 day period.
panels.title: 7 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 30 day period compared to the previous 30 day period.
panels.title: 30 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 90 day period compared to the previous 90 day period.
panels.title: 90 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 365 day period compared to the previous 365 day period.
panels.title: 1 Year Change

panels.description: Number of active Hedera retail accounts within the last hour.
panels.title: Active Last Hour

options.content: Active Retail Accounts count the everyday users who are actively sending transactions, excluding those involved in coding or managing smart contracts. In other words, it measures only regular accounts by filtering out developer-related actions and smart contract activities. View the docs and methodology.

panels.description: Total active retail accounts over the last 90 day period.
panels.title: 90 Day Total

panels.description: The most recent 7 day period compared to the previous 7 day period.
panels.title: 7 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 30 day period compared to the previous 30 day period.
panels.title: 30 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 90 day period compared to the previous 90 day period.
panels.title: 90 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 365 day period compared to the previous 365 day period.
panels.title: 1 Year Change

panels.description: Number of active Hedera smart contracts within the last hour.
panels.title: Active Last Hour

options.content: This statistic counts the number of unique smart contracts that have been actively used to make changes on the blockchain, rather than just sitting idle. It highlights real engagement by only including contracts that have successfully executed a transaction that updates the network. View the docs and methodology.

panels.description: Total active smart contracts over the last 90 days.
panels.title: 90 Day Total

panels.description: The most recent 7 day period compared to the previous 7 day period.
panels.title: 7 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 30 day period compared to the previous 30 day period.
panels.title: 30 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 90 day period compared to the previous 90 day period.
panels.title: 90 Day Change

panels.description: The most recent 365 day period compared to the previous 365 day period.
panels.title: 1 Year Change

options.content:
# **📊 HBAR & DeFi Stats**

A high-level view of DeFi ecosystem health via TVL, Stablecoin liquidity and HBAR price.

panels.description: The most recent HBAR price for Hedera (updated hourly).
panels.title: Latest HBAR Price

options.content: The average of candlestick closing prices for a given period for the HBAR/USDT pair on the five major exchanges by trading volume (Binance, Bybit, OKX, Bitget and MEXC) was calculated. The price is multiplied by 10,000 for integer representation for each time period. View the docs and methodology

panels.description: The current price of HBAR compared to the price of HBAR 24 hours ago.
panels.title: 24h Change

panels.description: The current price of HBAR compared to the price of HBAR 168 hours ago.
panels.title: 7d Change

panels.description: The current price of HBAR compared to the price of HBAR 720 hours ago.
panels.title: 30d Change

panels.description: The current price of HBAR compared to the price of HBAR 2160 hours ago.
panels.title: 90d Change

panels.description: The current price of HBAR compared to the price of HBAR 8760 hours ago.
panels.title: 1 Year Change

panels.description: The most recent Stablecoin Marketcap for Hedera (updated every 10 minutes).
panels.title: Current TVL

options.content: Hgraph fetches TVL data from the DeFiLlama API, which returns asset values along with a timestamp in seconds. Then, the timestamps are converted to regular dates, grouped by day, and saved into a table to track daily liquidity. View the docs and methodology.

panels.description: The current total value locked compared to 7 days ago.
panels.title: 7 Day Change

panels.description: The current total value locked compared to 30 days ago.
panels.title: 30 Day Change

panels.description: The current total value locked compared to 90 days ago.
panels.title: 90 Day Change

panels.description: The current total value locked compared to 365 days ago.
panels.title: 1 Year Change

panels.description: The most recent Stablecoin Marketcap for Hedera (updated every 10 minutes).
panels.title: Stablecoin Marketcap

options.content: Hgraph gets the data by calling the DeFiLlama API that returns daily JSON records with a Unix timestamp and the total stablecoin value in USD. Each timestamp is turned into a one-day period, and the USD value is used as is to show that day's stablecoin activity. View the docs and methodology.

panels.description: The current stablecoin marketcap compared to 7 days ago.
panels.title: 7 Day Change

panels.description: The current stablecoin marketcap compared to 30 days ago.
panels.title: 30 Day Change

panels.description: The current stablecoin marketcap compared to 90 days ago.
panels.title: 90 Day Change

panels.description: The current stablecoin marketcap compared to 365 days ago.
panels.title: 1 Year Change

options.content:
🌡️ About Hedera Stats

Powerful insights for builders, investors and operators on Hedera.

This dashboard is a demo of how this data, leveraging open-source methodologies, can be used. Hedera Stats shows key network metrics—revenue, active accounts, TVL, and economic activity—in an easy-to-read format. Built by Hgraph, this dashbard demonstrates the power of these Hedera Stats endpoints. Access the data via Hgraph's GraphQL API. Sign up for a free account and check the Hedera Stats documentation for methodologies and code examples.

Tip: Click a heading like > ☰ Active Accounts to expand the chart and metrics.

💜 Hedera Stats Users

Use these API endpoints and methodologies in your data-driven applications.

Leading organizations, projects and ecosystems trust Hedera Stats data streams. Some of these include Hedera (website), HashScan, Hashgraph, Hashpoint Research, The Hashgraph Group and more. Tell us about your project.
← Hgraph  /  Hedera APIs  /  Enterprise  /  AI Assistant  /  Documentation

Hgraph Hedera Stats Dashboard (Beta)
Bug reports, questions or ideas? Share your feedback.
